藡藡藡

Related Character(s): 荻
Связанный символ (и): 荻

藡字的基本解释

藡
dí
古同“荻”。

藡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dí］
［《廣韻》徒歷切，入鍚，定。］
亦作“蔐1”。亦作“藡1”。
多年生草本植物，与芦同类。生长在水边。根茎都有节似竹，叶抱茎生，秋天生紫色或白色、草黄色花穗，茎可以编席箔。

藡字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　藡； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1065第42
【玉篇】同荻。

藡字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
藡字的起名意思

暂无。

Lotus
Basic explanation of words
Lotus
dí
Ancient with "Di".
Lotus
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dí］
["Guangyun" cuts through the calendar, enters and sets. ]
Also known as "蔐1". Also known as "藡1".
Perennial herb, similar to reed. Grows by the water. The rhizomes are all knotted like bamboo, the leaves hold the stems, and the purple or white, grassy yellow flower spikes grow in autumn. The stems can be woven into foil.
Lotus

[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zhezi] 　藡; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1065 Page 42
【Jade articles】Same as Di.
